ticket.title: more verbose warning on boot failure
ticket.original-body: It would be helpful for at least a few people [myself included] if, when rails encounters a LoadError loading rubygems, it outputs what the error was. In my instance someone was requiring, a few lines above, an added gem which I didn't have, however, the error was being swallowed up and blamed on a gem version [which wasn't the real cause]. This patch is simple and clears up any doubts for the user.
